pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Utilities for using Neptune client on AWSThis integration exposes the `init_run()` function that reads the Neptune API token and project name fromAWS Secrets Manager instead of environment variables.```pythonfrom neptune.integrations.aws import init_runrun = init_run( secret="neptune-secret", # Use your secret name here region="us-west-1", # Use the appropriate region here)```
